Posts.Content: Loved that quote. As a matter of fact I love to read or recieve one every day. So you just keep posting them. Thanks for sharing, Edie
Posts.Title: A quote I thought I would share

Posts.Content: So happy for you and you look Mahvelous Dahling!
Posts.Title: new pix up

Posts.Content: I will certainly keep that in mind. That's pretty scary! Glad you shared that one. Thanks for the heads up, Edie
Posts.Title: Had a tiny wart...warning

Posts.Content: So sorry to hear you are having such terrible pain. Hopefully the radiation treatment will do the trick for you. In the mean time prayers and warm fuzzies headed your way. I too have bone mets, so i'm following your lead with this one. ((((Hugs)))) Edie
Posts.Title: Update BJmom

Posts.Content: Cheers to The Hogwarts and a great 2011!!!!! Peace and Love, Edie
Posts.Title: I was asked to post this occasionally~ the start of a New Year seems like the right time for our New BC board Family Members

Posts.Content: And you said it so well. Congratulations to your sister and family. Happy New Year. Peace and Love, Edie
Posts.Title: The Miracle of Life.... I just had to share...

Posts.Content: The first chemo is the hardest, since you don't know what to expect. Once you feel comfortable with all your meds it does get easier. I'm not saying that it's a trip to Disney mind you, but it is doable. Best of luck and keep us posted. Peace and Love, Edie
